heading: Isiqu sikaJese (uKristu) siyokwahlulela ngokulunga—Ulwazi ngoNkulunkulu luyosibekela umhlaba ngeminyaka eyinkulungwane—INkosi iyophakamisa isibonakaliso futhi iqoqe u-Israyeli—Qhathanisa no-Isaya 11. Cishe ngonyaka wama 559 kuya kowama 545 ngaphambi kokuzalwa kukaKristu.

verses.txt: Futhi kuyovela induku kuso isiqu sikaJese, futhi igatsha liyokhula ezimpandeni zaso.
UMoya weNkosi uyohlala phezu kwakhe, umoya wokuhlakanipha kanye nokuqonda, umoya wokwaluleka kanye namandla, umoya wolwazi kanye nowokuyesaba iNkosi.
Uyomenza abe ngonokuqonda okusheshayo ekuyesabeni iNkosi; futhi akayikwahlulela ngokubona kwamehlo akhe, noma asole ngokuzwa kwezindlebe zakhe.
Kepha uyokwahlulela abampofu ngokulunga, futhi abasole ngokulinganayo abathobileyo bomhlaba; futhi uyoshaya umhlaba ngenduku yomlomo wakhe, nangomphefumulo wezindebe zakhe abulale ababi.
Futhi ukulunga kuyoba yibhande lezinkalo zakhe, nokuthembeka kuyoba yibhande lamanyonga akhe.
Phezu kwalokho impisi iyohlala newundlu, nengwe iyolala phansi nezinyane lembuzi, ithole kanye nezinyane lengonyama kanye nokukhuluphalisiweyo ndawonye; umntwana omncane uyozihola.
Inkomazi kanye nebhele kuyoklaba; amazinyane akho ayolala phansi ndawonye; ingonyama iyodla utshani njengenkabi.
Umntwana oncelayo uyodlala emgodini wemfezi, futhi umntwana osanda kususwa ebeleni uyofaka isandla sakhe esiseleni sikamantshingeyana.
Abayikulimaza noma babhubhise entabeni yami yonke engcwele, ngokuba umhlaba uyogcwala ulwazi lweNkosi, njengamanzi esibekela ulwandle.
Futhi ngalolo suku kuyoba khona impande kaJese, eyokuma njengesibonakaliso kubantu; kuso abeZizwe bayobuthana; futhi ukuphumula kwakhe kuyoba kuhle kakhulu.

Futhi kuyokwenzeka ngalolo suku ukuthi iNkosi iyokwelula isandla sayo futhi okwesibili ukubuyisa insalela yabantu bayo abayobe besele, e-Asiriya, naseGibithe, nasePhatirosi, naseKushe, nase-Elamu, naseShineyari, naseHamati, kanye naseziqhingini zolwandle.
Futhi uyophakamisela izizwe isibonakaliso, futhi aqoqe abaxoshwa bakwa-Israyeli, aqoqele ndawonye abahlakazekileyo bakwaJuda emagumbini amane omhlaba.
Umhawu ka-Efrayimi phezu kwalokho uyosuka, izitha zikaJuda ziyosuswa; u-Efrayimi akayikuba namhawu ngoJuda, futhi noJuda akayikumhlupha u-Efrayimi.
Kepha bayondizela emahlombe amaFilisti ukuya ngasentshonalanga; baphange nabasempumalanga kanye-kanye; bayokwelula isandla sabo kuyo i-Edomi kanye neMowabi; futhi abantwana bama-Amoni bayobalalela.

Futhi iNkosi iyolibhubhisa nya ulimi lwasolwandle lwaseGibithe; futhi ngomoya wayo onamandla iyonyakazisa isandla sayo phezu komfula, futhi iyowushaya ube yimifudlana eyisikhombisa, futhi yenze abantu bawele ngezicathulo ezomileyo.
Futhi kuyoba khona umgwaqo omkhulu wensalela yabantu bakhe abayosala, e-Asiriya, njengoba kwakunjalo ku-Israyeli ngosuku lolo aphuma ngalo ezweni laseGibithe.
